panels.description: OTLP Exporter latency per status code
panels.title: Latency per rpc status code

panels.description: Average batch size per rpc method

targets.expr:
sum by (rpc_service, rpc_method) (rate(output_plugin_rpc_client_requests_per_rpc_sum[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum by (rpc_service, rpc_method) (
  rate(output_plugin_rpc_client_requests_per_rpc_count[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Average batch size

targets.expr:
sum by (rpc_grpc_status_code, server_address) (
  rate(output_plugin_otel_sdk_exporter_operation_duration_seconds_count{rpc_grpc_status_code!="0"}[$__rate_interval])
)
or on (rpc_grpc_status_code, server_address)
0 * sum by (rpc_grpc_status_code, server_address) (
  rate(output_plugin_otel_sdk_exporter_operation_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval])
)
